description: Email MBOX Analysis Application - PRD Work Items

work_items.title: Address Rankings API Endpoints
work_items.description: Implement /api/v1/addresses endpoints for address statistics, rankings leaderboard, and detailed address metrics

work_items.title: Rankings Page - Frontend UI
work_items.description: Create Rankings page with leaderboard table showing top addresses by influence/activity scores, sortable columns, and address detail view

work_items.title: Organization Detection & Classification
work_items.description: Auto-detect organizations from email domains and classify them (corporate, academic, government, personal)

work_items.title: Organizations Page - Frontend UI
work_items.description: Create Organizations page showing detected organizations with communication statistics

work_items.title: FTS5 Full-Text Search Implementation
work_items.description: Implement SQLite FTS5 full-text search with custom tokenization and index triggers

work_items.title: Advanced Search API
work_items.description: Implement /api/v1/search endpoint with boolean operators, faceted search, and result highlighting

work_items.title: Search Page - Frontend UI
work_items.description: Connect AdvancedSearch component to search API with results display and filters

work_items.title: Network Analysis API
work_items.description: Implement network graph API endpoint returning nodes and edges for address communication network

work_items.title: Network Visualization Page
work_items.description: Connect NetworkVisualization component to API and create interactive network analysis page

work_items.title: MBOX Reading & Parsing
work_items.description: Parse MBOX files and extract emails with metadata

work_items.title: Attachment Extraction & Storage
work_items.description: Extract and store attachments with deduplication

work_items.title: Basic Web Interface & Email Viewing
work_items.description: Web interface for browsing emails

work_items.title: Email Threading & Conversation View
work_items.description: Thread detection and conversation display

work_items.title: Analytics Dashboard - Backend API
work_items.description: Analytics overview API endpoint with email statistics

work_items.title: Analytics Dashboard - Frontend UI
work_items.description: Implement Analytics Dashboard frontend connecting to /api/v1/analytics/overview endpoint. Display totals, storage stats, activity metrics, and date range.

work_items.title: Analytics Timeline Chart
work_items.description: Add timeline chart showing email activity over time

work_items.title: Top Senders/Recipients Analytics
work_items.description: Add top senders and recipients analytics with charts

work_items.title: Attachment Statistics Analytics
work_items.description: Add attachment statistics with file type breakdown, storage utilization, and largest files analysis. API endpoint and frontend component.

work_items.title: Analytics Data Export
work_items.description: Add export capabilities for analytics data in CSV and JSON formats

work_items.title: Email Activity Heatmap
work_items.description: Add heatmap visualization showing email activity by hour of day and day of week

work_items.title: Thread Activity Analytics
work_items.description: Add thread activity analysis showing conversation patterns, engagement metrics, thread size/duration distributions, and top active threads

work_items.title: IMAP Server - Basic Implementation
work_items.description: Basic IMAP server setup with capabilities

work_items.title: IMAP Server - Full Protocol Implementation
work_items.description: Implement full IMAP protocol with proper authentication, mailbox operations, and email fetching

work_items.title: Email List Type Safety
work_items.description: Fix EmailList component TypeScript type for emails array

work_items.title: Email List API Endpoint
work_items.description: Fix EmailList to use correct API endpoint /api/v1/emails and handle response structure

work_items.title: Enforce lint before commit
work_items.description: Add pre-commit hook for linting
